include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Game_P1 )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CryAction )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CryOnline )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/Tools/PRT )
#include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/mongodb/include/libbson-1.0 )
#include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/mongodb/include/libmongoc-1.0 )
include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/speex-1.0.5/include )
#include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/websdk/libcore/include )
#include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/websdk/libgface/include )
#include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/websdk/libgface/include )

# This makes uber files with order independent include of winsock2.h and windows.h compile
#add_definitions(-D_WINSOCKAPI_)
add_definitions(-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SOURCES})

if (WIN64)
	target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} ws2_32 Gdi32 netapi32 )
	#target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SDK_DIR}/mongodb/lib/x64/bson-static-1.0.lib )
	#target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SDK_DIR}/mongodb/lib/x64/mongoc-static-1.0.lib )
	#target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SDK_DIR}/websdk/libgface/windows/x64/libgface.lib )
elseif (WIN32)
	target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} ws2_32 Gdi32 netapi32 )
	#target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SDK_DIR}/mongodb/lib/win32/bson-static-1.0.lib )
	#target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SDK_DIR}/mongodb/lib/win32/mongoc-static-1.0.lib )
	#target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SDK_DIR}/websdk/libgface/windows/x86/libgface.lib )
endif()

USE_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER( ${THIS_PROJECT} "StdAfx.h" "StdAfx.cpp" )

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

FILE(WRITE "durango_title_id.h" "// Auto generated by CMake\n")
